rundown: 3-4 L @ Chicago Cubs Joey Wentz: 4.0 innings, 4 earned runs, 7 hits, 1 HR, 8 strikeouts Batters: Ozzie Albies (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) Eli White (1 hit - 3 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) Ha-Seong Kim (2 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 0 RBI) The Braves fell short in a close game against the Chicago Cubs, losing by a single run. Despite a strong performance from Joey Wentz on the mound, who struck out 8 batters, he allowed 4 earned runs which ultimately cost the team. Key highlights include: 1. Ozzie Albies hit a home run and contributed 2 hits to the Braves' offense. 2. Eli White also added a home run, showcasing the team's power despite the loss. 3. Ha-Seong Kim had a solid game with 2 hits, helping to keep the offense alive.
